title: Request for Proposals: Traditional, Complementary and Integrative Medicine - Development of WHO Benchmarks
description: The World Health Organization's Department of Integrated Health Services is seeking a contractor to support the work of Traditional, Complementary and Integrative Medicine. The successful bidder will carry out coordination of work in the development of the WHO benchmarks for Training in Anthroposophic medicine, develop models and criteria for assessment in the integration of T&CM into health systems, and coordinate the work in TCI rehabilitation.Your company or institution is invited to submit a proposal for the services in response to this Request for Proposals (RFP). The services required by the World Health Organization are fully described in the Terms of Reference attached to this RFP.Proposals should be submitted to WHO in writing no later than 11 February 2022 at 17h00 CET ("the closing date"), by email at the following address: burminae@who.int.We look forward to receiving your response to this RFP.
cleaned_text: The World Health Organization's Department of Integrated Health Services is seeking a contractor to support the work of Traditional, Complementary and Integrative Medicine. The successful bidder will carry out coordination of work in the development of the WHO benchmarks for Training in Anthroposophic medicine, develop models and criteria for assessment in the integration of T&CM into health systems, and coordinate the work in TCI rehabilitation. Your company or institution is invited to submit a proposal for the services in response to this Request for Proposals (RFP). The services required by the World Health Organization are fully described in the Terms of Reference attached to this RFP. Proposals should be submitted to WHO in writing no later than 11 February 2022 at 17h00 CET ("the closing date"), by email at the following address: [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#e88a9d9a858186898da89f8087c681869cd79b9d8a828d8b9cd5bcaba1c5dad8dadac5ac8d9e8d848798858d869cc8878ec8bfa0a7c8aa8d868b8085899a839b). We look forward to receiving
